analyzed: chen po rnams la phan btags lan du 'phral la 'bras bu dam pas brlan pa nyid //

analyzed: khyod ni g-yo med rtse mor gnas tshe aa mra'i nags kyi 'bras bu rgyas par smin pa ni //

analyzed: phyogs kun khyab par bkram pa dga' ma'i rnam mdzes len bu dag dang mtshungs pa bzhin du gyur //

analyzed: sa gzhi'i mdzes ma'i nu rgyas lhag ma dkar zhing thig le sngon pos mdzes pa bzhin //

analyzed: 'chi med khyo shug dag ni ya mtshan nges pa thob pa'i mig gis rab tu lta bar byed //

analyzed: de nas ri dags pa dag po'i chung ma'i nags kyi khang pa de la yud tsam gnas byas nas //

analyzed: de yi pha rol chu las thon nas mchog tu myur bas lam gzhan dag tu gshegs shing bgrod pa na //

analyzed: drang srong bu mo'i chu bo 'bigs byed ri yi zhabs ni rtsub pa'i rdol 'og tu 'bab ldan ma //
translated: The river of the Ṛṣi’s daughter, flowing through the rocky defile of the Vindhyas,

analyzed: so gnyis yan lag mchog las dkar mo tshon gyis legs bris bzhin du khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur //

analyzed: nags kyi glang po myos pa'i tig ta'i ro dang 'dzam bu'i shing gi chu de'ang myur du 'gengs //
translated: And quickly fill your trunk with the sweet water of the mango tree and the intoxicating juice of the madhuka tree.

analyzed: kva ye sbrin stug khyod ni nang gi snying po ldan na dri bzhon dag gis g-yo mi nus //
translated: Ah! You, the cloud, are full of essence within, and the wind cannot move you,

analyzed: gang phyir thams cad stong na yang bar 'gyur zhing yongs su gang na kun kyang lji ba nyid //
translated: For when you are empty, you are light, and when you are full, you are heavy.

translated: “Ah, my friend, if you think to go quickly to your beloved,

translated: “Have you come well, O crest-jewel, with your eyes full of tears?” Thus you will be detained a long time by the women.

analyzed: de slad khyod ni shin tu shin tu myur ba 'gro bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ji ltar yin //
translated: So how can you go so very quickly?

translated: When you arrive, the geese will stay there for a little while, and then leave.

analyzed: de yi byang phyogs gzhi la bi di sha zhes mchod cha rgyal po'i khab tu myur song nas //
translated: To the north of that, on the ground, is the king’s palace called Vidiśa. Go there quickly.

translated: There you will obtain the supreme fruit of great size and the supreme state immediately.

analyzed: che ba'i kha zheng dang ldan mtha' nas lhung lhung skad snyan sgrogs shing dang zhing bsil ldan pa //
translated: The river is very wide, and the sound of its flowing water is pleasant and cool.

analyzed: g-yo ba'i rlabs phreng gdong kha smin ma g-yo bzhin pa 'dra'i mtsho de'ang skal bzang khyod 'thung 'gyur //
translated: And the sea, with its waves like the fluttering eyelashes of a lovely woman, you will drink.

analyzed: gang zhig ni tsa zhes grags ri bor khyod 'ongs thob las der ni ngal bso'i ched du gnas //
translated: When you have reached the mountain called Nīla, rest there for a while.

analyzed: ka dam pa yi me tog dga' bas spu long rgyas shing ge sar 'dzum par byed pa bzhin //
translated: The kadāmba flowers will be delighted to see you, and will open their filaments.

original: grong khyer rnams ni sman 'tshong ma rnams dga' bar byed pa'i dri bzangs dag gis gang ba rnams //
analyzed: grong khyer rnams ni sman 'tshong ma rnams dga' bar byed pa'i dri bzangs dag gis gang ba rnams //
translated: The cities will be filled with the sweet perfume of the incense of the courtesans.

analyzed: rdo yi phrag phrug rnams kyi mchog tu mdzes ba'i lang tshom rnams smra ru 'jug pa bzhin //
translated: The beautiful young women will be like the most lovely of stone maidens, brought to life.

analyzed: ngal sos gyur na bgrong bya gsar skyes rnams kyi me tog gsar pa'i dra ba mdzes pa rnams //
translated: When you have rested, you will see the lovely new flower garlands of the newly married women.

analyzed: chu bo chu ngogs skyes pa rnams ni chu thigs rnams kyis bran pa 'phral du 'ongs 'gyur zhing //
translated: The riverbank trees will be sprinkled with water and will immediately put forth new leaves.

analyzed: yang ni byang gi phyogs su bgrod cing gang zhig khyed ni 'khyog po'i lam la zhugs pa'i tshe //
translated: Then, as you proceed to the north, you will enter the path of the setting sun.

analyzed: grong khyer audzdza ya na'i rgyal po'i pho brang nang du phyir phyogs min par gnas par mdzod //

analyzed: de na grong gi dga' ma rnams kyi rol sgeg zur mig glog gi @344a * //
translated: There, if the glances of the city women, sidelong glances that are the play of love,

original: thag pa g-yo ba ni //
analyzed: thag pa g-yo ba ni //
translated: flickering like lightning

analyzed: skyong byed mig gis gal te khyod ni ma mthong 'bras bu med cing bslus pa nyid du 'ang 'gyur //
translated: and charming, should not be seen by you, O cloud, it will be fruitless and a deception.

analyzed: rlabs phreng g-yo ldan snyan par sgrogs shing 'dab chags phreng ba'i rked rgyan ska rags sil sil can //
translated: The waves are its swaying arms, the cries of the birds are its sweet voice, and the girdle of foam is its tinkling belt.

analyzed: dga' ma rnams kyis mdza' bo rnams la rol sgeg thog mar ston cing rked rgyan 'grol 'dra mtho'a //
translated: As if to show her girdle loosened in her dalliance with her lover, the wind.

analyzed: de rgal sindhu'i chu ni len bu bzhin du lus ni rab tu phra bar gyur pa can //
translated: Beyond it, the waters of the Sindhu, thin as a streak of lightning,

analyzed: dgos su gyur pa'i shing ni rnyings pa'i 'dab ma lhung ba rnams kyis khyab par bkram pas dkar //

analyzed: kva ye skal bzang khyod dang bral bar gnas pas lus kyi gnas skabs 'di 'drar 'gyur //

translated: Either you have left your wife and taken up the life of a recluse, or you are dead: which is it? Tell me, I pray you.

analyzed: aa wanta'i yul thog na au da ya na'i gtam ni grong gi rgan mos shes pa yod //
translated: In the land of Avanti, the old women of the town know the story of Udayana.

analyzed: de rjes grong khyer sngar bstan khang pa yangs shing dpal dang phun tshogs che ldan yangs pa can //

analyzed: 'dzam gling sa gzhir mtho ris mdzes ldan dum bu bsod nams lhag ma rnams kyi skabs gsum pa'i //
translated: is like a third part of the beautiful heaven on the earth, with the remaining merits of the people.

analyzed: gang du bzhad rnams myos pa'i gdangs snyan che bar sgrogs shing yid 'ong sgra ni gsal bar byed //

analyzed: nyi gzhon gyis rgyas chu skyes dri bzangs dga' skyed bska ba'i ro ldan yid du 'ong gyur cing //

analyzed: chu thigs kyis bran dri bzhon bud med chags gzir gdung ba phrog byed lus kyi rjes mthun pa //

analyzed: bdag bo mchog ni 'dod don gnyer bar byed la snyan par sgrogs shing dga' bar byed pa bzhin //

analyzed: de yi nor ldan khang pa rnams na len bu spos kyis bdugs pa'i dri bzangs dra ba nas //
translated: In his houses, which are full of wealth, the sweet scent of the incense of aloeswood wafts through the lattice windows.

analyzed: 'thon pas khyod lus cher 'gyur khyim gyi gcug pud can ni dga' bas gnyen mthong gar gyis ni //

analyzed: mchod 'bul chu skyes dri bzangs ldan pa bud med rol sgeg ldan pa'i rkang pa'i tshon rnams kyis //
translated: In the middle of the footprints of the women, which are marked with lac and have the sweet scent of lotus flowers,

analyzed: mtshan pa rnams kyi dbus su dub par gyur pa'i rang nyid sdug bsngal bsal bar bya //
translated: you will remove the suffering of your own fatigue.

analyzed: yang ni srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dpal mgrin gnas su bsod nams ldan khyod bgrod par bya //

analyzed: yid 'ong dri ldan chu la lang tsho ma rnams rol sgeg khrus ni byed ba'i dri ldang zhing //
translated: The water, fragrant and delightful, is used by the young women for their playful bathing.🔽

translated: The water, fragrant and delightful, is the bathing pool of the nymphs, and the wind, perfumed with the fragrance of the utpala flowers, is their fan.

analyzed: nyin mor byed pa 'dren byed yul du 'ongs par gyur gyi bar du khyod ni gnas par mdzod //

analyzed: rol sgeg g-yo ba'i rin chen 'od 'phros lus mdzes rnga yab 'dzin pas ngal ba'i lag pa can //
translated: Her body is beautiful with the flashing light of moving gems, and her hand is wearied by holding a chowrie.

original: tshogs kyi mdzes ma sen rjes gsar pas gdungs la khyod las char thigs thob na tshim byed pa //
analyzed: tshogs kyi mdzes ma sen rjes gsar pas gdungs la khyod las char thigs thob na tshim byed pa //
translated: She is tormented by the fresh nailmarks of the assembly of your rivals, but she will be satisfied if she can get a drop of water from you.

original: khyod la sbrang rtsi byed pa'i phreng ba bzhin du g-yo ba'i zur mig ring ba dag gis blta bar 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod la sbrang rtsi byed pa'i phreng ba bzhin du g-yo ba'i zur mig ring ba dag gis blta bar 'gyur //
translated: She will look at you with sidelong glances that move like a garland of bees making honey.

original: phyugs bdag glang chen lpags rlon 'dod bzhin gyon nas gar ni rtsom pa 'phrogs par gyur pa bzhin //
analyzed: phyugs bdag glang chen lpags rlon 'dod bzhin gyon nas gar ni rtsom pa 'phrogs par gyur pa bzhin //
translated: You will be like a king of elephants, who, having put on a fresh elephant skin as he wished, was seized and held by the trunk of a tree as he began to dance.

original: khyod 'ongs snga dro'i thun mtshams nyi gzhon dmar ba'i 'od kyis dmar ba'i chu skyes 'dzin byed cing ;
analyzed: khyod 'ongs snga dro'i thun mtshams nyi gzhon dmar ba'i 'od kyis dmar ba'i chu skyes 'dzin byed cing ;
translated: You will come in the morning, holding a red lotus reddened by the rays of the rising sun,

original: / rgyab nas mtho ba'i lag pa zlum po'i nags kyi shing chen dag gis brgyangs nas 'dzin cing gnas //
analyzed: / rgyab nas mtho ba'i lag pa zlum po'i nags kyi shing chen dag gis brgyangs nas 'dzin cing gnas //
translated: and you will stay, held by the trunks of the great forest trees, which are round and high at the back.

original: zhi ba'i char rgyun 'bab tshe ri yi sras mos g-yo med mig gis gus pas lta bar byed //
analyzed: zhi ba'i char rgyun 'bab tshe ri yi sras mos g-yo med mig gis gus pas lta bar byed //
translated: When the rain of peace falls, the daughter of the mountain will look at you with unmoving eyes, with respect.

original: des na bdag po'i gnas su mchog gi btsun mo rnams ni rab dags sgeg par byed pa na //
analyzed: des na bdag po'i gnas su mchog gi btsun mo rnams ni rab dags sgeg par byed pa na //
translated: So, in the place of honor, the king’s chief wives, in the height of passion, are making love.

original: mtshan mo'i mun pa stug po rnams kyis mi yi bdag po'i lam gyi snang ba 'gog byed pas //
analyzed: mtshan mo'i mun pa stug po rnams kyis mi yi bdag po'i lam gyi snang ba 'gog byed pas //
translated: The thick darkness of night blocks the light of the lamps on the king’s path.

original: khyod kyi glog 'od gser mtshungs 'od kyi snang bas sa gzhi'i lam ni kun nas bstan par mdzod //
analyzed: khyod kyi glog 'od gser mtshungs 'od kyi snang bas sa gzhi'i lam ni kun nas bstan par mdzod //
translated: You must show the way with the golden light of your lightning.

original: chu char 'brug dbyangs sgra chen mang po ma byed mdzes pa de rnams skrag cing 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: chu char 'brug dbyangs sgra chen mang po ma byed mdzes pa de rnams skrag cing 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: Do not frighten and kill the beautiful peacocks with the great thunder of your rain clouds.

original: de rnams kyis ni khang bzangs phug nor nyal sa steng gi rgya phubs 'ga' zhig dag tu ni //
analyzed: de rnams kyis ni khang bzangs phug nor nyal sa steng gi rgya phubs 'ga' zhig dag tu ni //
translated: They have spent the night in the caves of the palace, in the open pavilions,

original: yun ring 'ongs las dub pa'i rang gi dga' ma glog ma'i don du mtshan mo gnas byas nas //
analyzed: yun ring 'ongs las dub pa'i rang gi dga' ma glog ma'i don du mtshan mo gnas byas nas //
translated: resting for a long time from their journey for the sake of their beloved lightning.

original: nyi ma mthong tshe khyod ni slar yang lhag ma'i lam dag shin tu mgyogs pas bgrod par bya //
analyzed: nyi ma mthong tshe khyod ni slar yang lhag ma'i lam dag shin tu mgyogs pas bgrod par bya //
translated: When they see the sun, you must quickly go the rest of the way.

original: gang phyir snying grogs dag gi don du 'bad pa @345a * //
analyzed: gang phyir snying grogs dag gi don du 'bad pa @345a * //
translated: For the sake of your friends, you must make an effort.

original: byas pa des par bya ba byas pa nyid //
analyzed: byas pa des par bya ba byas pa nyid //
translated: The sun has done its task, and now,

original: de yi dus su nyin mor byed pas lam ni dor nas myur du 'gro bar bya //
analyzed: de yi dus su nyin mor byed pas lam ni dor nas myur du 'gro bar bya //
translated: at the end of its path, it hastens to its setting.🔽It is not without reason that it has spread its rays so widely;

original: 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba bsgrags na khro ba chung ba min pa khyod la byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba bsgrags na khro ba chung ba min pa khyod la byed par 'gyur //
translated: it is to make you, who are not easily angered, do your duty.

original: mtshan mo bdag po song ba'i bud med mig gi mchi ma sel la bdag po 'ong ba bzhin //
analyzed: mtshan mo bdag po song ba'i bud med mig gi mchi ma sel la bdag po 'ong ba bzhin //
translated: The women have dried their eyes, which the moon had filled with tears, since he was their lord;

original: padmo'i yum gyi chu skyes gdong gi mig chu de yang rab tu sel ba byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: padmo'i yum gyi chu skyes gdong gi mig chu de yang rab tu sel ba byed par 'gyur //
translated: and now the moon will dry the eyes of the lotus-born, which are filled with tears, since he is their lord.

original: rab du dang ba'i sems bzhin shin tu zab mo dang ldan mtsho yi chu yi chu yi nang du ni //
analyzed: rab du dang ba'i sems bzhin shin tu zab mo dang ldan mtsho yi chu yi chu yi nang du ni //
translated: In the deep water of the lake, which is clear like the mind of the virtuous,

original: khyod kyi gzugs brnyan yang ni rang bzhin skal ba bzang po bdag nyid 'char ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod kyi gzugs brnyan yang ni rang bzhin skal ba bzang po bdag nyid 'char ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: your reflection will rise of its own accord, as if it were your good fortune incarnate.

original: de slad de yi ku mu ta ni dkar po rnams kyis khyod la bkur sti bsnyen bkur byed //
analyzed: de slad de yi ku mu ta ni dkar po rnams kyis khyod la bkur sti bsnyen bkur byed //
translated: The white lilies will pay homage to you,

original: brtags pas don yod bya ba'i ched du g-yo ldan nya rnams gyen du 'phar zhing lta bar byed //
analyzed: brtags pas don yod bya ba'i ched du g-yo ldan nya rnams gyen du 'phar zhing lta bar byed //
translated: The artful fish, when they perceive the danger, leap up and look about them.

original: de yi chu gos sngon pos chu yi dogs kyi tshing ra 'phrogs par byas nas spangs pa na //
analyzed: de yi chu gos sngon pos chu yi dogs kyi tshing ra 'phrogs par byas nas spangs pa na //
translated: The water, with its blue garment of the waves, has been stripped of its covering of foam.

original: ma 'phrog ces ni shing chen yal ga'i lag pa dag gis dbus su cung zad 'dzin pa bzhin //
analyzed: ma 'phrog ces ni shing chen yal ga'i lag pa dag gis dbus su cung zad 'dzin pa bzhin //
translated: The trees, with their branches for hands, seem to be holding back the water in the middle, saying, “Stop, stop!”

original: kva ye grogs po chu 'thungs lto khengs lji nas lam du 'gro ba yang ni ji ltar yin //
analyzed: kva ye grogs po chu 'thungs lto khengs lji nas lam du 'gro ba yang ni ji ltar yin //
translated: “Ah, my friend, how can you go on your way, heavy-laden with a full belly and a full skin-bag of water?

original: mdzes ma'i sgron ma mdzes pa'i bro ba shes na ji ltar 'dor ba'i nus pa yong pa yin //
analyzed: mdzes ma'i sgron ma mdzes pa'i bro ba shes na ji ltar 'dor ba'i nus pa yong pa yin //
translated: How can you have the heart to leave the beautiful lamp of a woman, when you know the beauty of her taste?

original: khyod ni de pa'i ri las nye bar 'gro tshe ngal bu dal bu'i rlung ni ldang 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: khyod ni de pa'i ri las nye bar 'gro tshe ngal bu dal bu'i rlung ni ldang 'gyur zhing //
translated: When you have gone far from that mountain, a gentle breeze will rise,

original: bsil ba'i rlung gis bsgos ba'i au du mw'a ra'i nags kyi 'bras bu 'chang zhing rol rtsed byed //
analyzed: bsil ba'i rlung gis bsgos ba'i au du mw'a ra'i nags kyi 'bras bu 'chang zhing rol rtsed byed //
translated: and you will play with the fruits of the Udumbara forest, perfumed by the cool wind.”

original: khyod kyis char chen phab pas nor 'dzin ma yi dri dang rlangs pa gtsang ma tshogs pa ni //
analyzed: khyod kyis char chen phab pas nor 'dzin ma yi dri dang rlangs pa gtsang ma tshogs pa ni //
translated: The earth, moistened by your rain, sends forth a pure and fragrant vapour,

original: so ldan rnams kyi sna yis rdub cing bu ga'i nang du skal bzang glu dbyangs sgrogs par byed //
analyzed: so ldan rnams kyi sna yis rdub cing bu ga'i nang du skal bzang glu dbyangs sgrogs par byed //
translated: which the wind wafts to the nostrils of the virtuous, and there produces a sweet music.

original: der ni skye mched nyi ma las lhag gzi ldan sreg zla las skyes don du phyogs ba can //
analyzed: der ni skye mched nyi ma las lhag gzi ldan sreg zla las skyes don du phyogs ba can //
translated: There dwells the moon-crested god, more radiant than the sun, the friend of the moon-born,

original: gtsug na zla ba rin chen mang gi dmag tshogs bsrung pa'i don du bskos pa de ni gnas //
analyzed: gtsug na zla ba rin chen mang gi dmag tshogs bsrung pa'i don du bskos pa de ni gnas //
translated: appointed to protect the army of the lord of riches.

original: khyod kyi mkha' yi gangg'a'i chu las sprin gyi me tog gsher ba mang po rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: khyod kyi mkha' yi gangg'a'i chu las sprin gyi me tog gsher ba mang po rnams kyis ni //
translated: The clouds, your children, the cranes of the sky, drink the water of the heavenly Ganges, and,

original: me tog gru char bdag nyid phab nga rnams kyis gang zhig de ni khrus ni byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: me tog gru char bdag nyid phab nga rnams kyis gang zhig de ni khrus ni byed par 'gyur //
translated: swollen with the flowers of rain, descend to bathe in the lake.

original: gtsug phung ldan de chu 'thungs dga' bas phyin nas ri gzung snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs gar dag byed //
analyzed: gtsug phung ldan de chu 'thungs dga' bas phyin nas ri gzung snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs gar dag byed //
translated: The god with the crest of hair drinks the water with delight, and, taking up his abode on the mountain, dances to the music of the sweet songs of the Kinnaras.

original: mig zur dkar ba'i zer gyis 'phrog byed gtsug gi zla ba'i 'od kyi zer ni skyengs byed kyang //🔽gang gi che ba'i mjug sgro mdongs 'od tshon rtsis bris bzhin mdzes pa 'od gyur pa //
analyzed: mig zur dkar ba'i zer gyis 'phrog byed gtsug gi zla ba'i 'od kyi zer ni skyengs byed kyang // gang gi che ba'i mjug sgro mdongs 'od tshon rtsis bris bzhin mdzes pa 'od gyur pa //
translated: The rays of the moon on Śiva's head are put to shame by the white gleam in the corners of her eyes.🔽The peacock's tail-feathers, lovely with the colors of the rainbow, are surpassed by the beauty of her hair.

original: au ma'i sras ni dga' bar byed pa chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du rna @345b bar byed pa yod //
analyzed: au ma'i sras ni dga' bar byed pa chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du rna @345b bar byed pa yod //
translated: The son of Umā, who delights the eyes, has lotus-like ears, but she has eyes like lotus petals.

original: smyig ma'i tshal nas skyes pa'i lha de yang dag mchod nas slar yang lam ni brgal bar mdzod //
analyzed: smyig ma'i tshal nas skyes pa'i lha de yang dag mchod nas slar yang lam ni brgal bar mdzod //
translated: Having duly worshipped that god born in the bamboo grove, go on your way.

original: grub pa'i khyo shug dag gi lag pa'i pi wang chu thigs brlan la 'jigs pas lam ni ster //
analyzed: grub pa'i khyo shug dag gi lag pa'i pi wang chu thigs brlan la 'jigs pas lam ni ster //
translated: The path is given by the hands of the ṛṣis, husband and wife, lest the water drops from their vīṇās should wet the ground.

original: khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sa bdag dga' ba'i lha yi sras po chu gter gzugs 'dzin ni ;
analyzed: khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sa bdag dga' ba'i lha yi sras po chu gter gzugs 'dzin ni ;
translated: You will see the son of the god of love, the king of the land, who has the form of the ocean,

original: / sa yi gzhi la byung zhing lhun po 'dod 'jo'i bu mos 'ongs nas mchod pa byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: / sa yi gzhi la byung zhing lhun po 'dod 'jo'i bu mos 'ongs nas mchod pa byed par 'gyur //
translated: born on the earth, and the wish-granting cow of Meru will come and worship him.

original: khyod kyi de yi rlabs ldan mtsho yi chu 'thungs 'ongs pa'i tshe na thag ring mthu las ni //
analyzed: khyod kyi de yi rlabs ldan mtsho yi chu 'thungs 'ongs pa'i tshe na thag ring mthu las ni //
translated: When you have drunk the water of the ocean, the abode of Vāruna, you will see in the distance🔽the great mountain, though it is small, anointed with the color of the honey of bees,

original: chen po yin yang phra mo dang ni sbrang rtsi'i bu yi kha dog bskus par gyur pa dang // chen po'i sa la aindra n'i la mu tig do shal dag ni gcig tu bkod pa bzhin //
analyzed: chen po yin yang phra mo dang ni sbrang rtsi'i bu yi kha dog bskus par gyur pa dang // chen po'i sa la aindra n'i la mu tig do shal dag ni gcig tu bkod pa bzhin //
translated: as if a necklace of pearls and sapphires were strung together on the great earth.

original: mkha' la bgrod pa rnams kyi mig rnams dag gis 'og tu blta zhing nges par mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' la bgrod pa rnams kyi mig rnams dag gis 'og tu blta zhing nges par mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: Those who travel through the sky will certainly see it below with their eyes.

original: de rnams brgal nas bgrod tshe smin ma 'khri shing gzhon nu rol pa rnams kyis mdzes ba can //
analyzed: de rnams brgal nas bgrod tshe smin ma 'khri shing gzhon nu rol pa rnams kyis mdzes ba can //
translated: When you have crossed it and are traveling, it is beautiful with the creepers of your eyebrows.🔽The beauty of your eyelashes moving upward,

original: dkar nag 'od zer dang ldan rnams kyi rdzi ma steng du bskyod par gyur pa'i mdzes pa dag /
analyzed: dkar nag 'od zer dang ldan rnams kyi rdzi ma steng du bskyod par gyur pa'i mdzes pa dag /
translated: possessing white and black light rays,

original: kun da'i me tog g-yo ba'i rjes 'gro sprang rtsi byed pa'i dpal gyi mdzes pa bzhin du ni //
analyzed: kun da'i me tog g-yo ba'i rjes 'gro sprang rtsi byed pa'i dpal gyi mdzes pa bzhin du ni //
translated: is like the beauty of the glory of the bee following the moving jasmine flower.

original: mdzes ldan da sha zhes bya'i grong khyer na chung mig gis blta 'dod la ni rang lus bstan par mdzod //
analyzed: mdzes ldan da sha zhes bya'i grong khyer na chung mig gis blta 'dod la ni rang lus bstan par mdzod //
translated: In the city of Śrī Daśapura, show yourself to the young woman who longs to see you.

original: dang por tshangs pha 'jug pa zhes bya'i ljongs la khyod ni bgrod bya 'og tu grib bsil bya //
analyzed: dang por tshangs pha 'jug pa zhes bya'i ljongs la khyod ni bgrod bya 'og tu grib bsil bya //
translated: First, in the country called Brahmapāriṣada, you should go to the shade below.

original: de nas rgyal rigs bcom pa'i dur ldan ku ru ba yi bzhin ni khyod kyis bstan par bya //
analyzed: de nas rgyal rigs bcom pa'i dur ldan ku ru ba yi bzhin ni khyod kyis bstan par bya //
translated: Then you should show yourself to the Kurus, whose faces are marked with the scars of the Kshatriya slaughter.

original: gang du srid sgrub mda' rnon brgya phrag dag gis rgyal rigs mang po'i mgo bo bcad pa ni //
analyzed: gang du srid sgrub mda' rnon brgya phrag dag gis rgyal rigs mang po'i mgo bo bcad pa ni //
translated: Where the hundred sharp arrows of Arjuna cut down the heads of many Kshatriyas,

original: khyod kyi gru char chen po rab tu mang po phab pas padma rnams ni chad pa bzhin //
analyzed: khyod kyi gru char chen po rab tu mang po phab pas padma rnams ni chad pa bzhin //
translated: as if the lotus plants were cut down by the fall of a great shower of rain from your clouds.

original: myos par byed pa'i ro ldan dga' ma snar ma'i tshig gis mtshan pa'i chang ni spang byas nas//
analyzed: myos par byed pa'i ro ldan dga' ma snar ma'i tshig gis mtshan pa'i chang ni spang byas nas//
translated: Having given up the wine of the intoxicating liquor of your beloved, which is marked with the name of the constellation Rohiṇī,

original: rang gi gnyen la dga' bar 'gyur bas yul las phyir phyogs stobs bzang gang de blta bar bya //
analyzed: rang gi gnyen la dga' bar 'gyur bas yul las phyir phyogs stobs bzang gang de blta bar bya //
translated: you should look for that Balarāma, who turns away from his country, delighting in his own relatives.

original: kva ye zhi ldan s'a ra sva ti'i chu la mngon par phyogs tshe khyod kyis 'thungs byas nas //
analyzed: kva ye zhi ldan s'a ra sva ti'i chu la mngon par phyogs tshe khyod kyis 'thungs byas nas //
translated: “When you face the water of the Sarāsvati, drink it,🔽

original: lus kyi kha dog dag ni nag por 'gyur zhing nang gi bsam pa yang ni dkar ba nyid //
analyzed: lus kyi kha dog dag ni nag por 'gyur zhing nang gi bsam pa yang ni dkar ba nyid //
translated: When thou hast drunk of the water of the Sarāsvati, thou wilt become black of body, but white of heart.

original: de nas bgrod pa'i phyi nas ka kha pa yi grong yod dza hu'i bu mo ri rgyal gyi //🔽ngos la bgrod pa dug can rgyal po'i bu ni mtho ris de yi them skas bgrod pa bzhin //
analyzed: de nas bgrod pa'i phyi nas ka kha pa yi grong yod dza hu'i bu mo ri rgyal gyi // ngos la bgrod pa dug can rgyal po'i bu ni mtho ris de yi them skas bgrod pa bzhin //
translated: Then, after thou hast crossed the Jahnu, there is the city of Kāśī, the daughter of the king of mountains,🔽which, like a staircase to heaven, is ascended by kings who have conquered their passions.

original: gang gi dbu ba'i phreng ba rnams kyis goo r'i'i zhal gyi khro gnyer rnams la dgod pa bzhin //
analyzed: gang gi dbu ba'i phreng ba rnams kyis goo r'i'i zhal gyi khro gnyer rnams la dgod pa bzhin //
translated: Its garlands of foam seem to laugh at the frowns of the Ganges,

original: bde 'byung skra nas rlabs kyi lag pa dag gis bzung nas zla phyed 'phrog par byed pa bzhin //🔽khyod ni gal te @346a * //
analyzed: bde 'byung skra nas rlabs kyi lag pa dag gis bzung nas zla phyed 'phrog par byed pa bzhin // khyod ni gal te @346a * //
translated: and the waves, with their hands of spray, seem to seize the moon and carry it off.🔽If thou thinkest of drinking its water,

original: de yi chu 'thungs bsams nas lus phyed lnga ma mkhar las 'phyang ba ni //
analyzed: de yi chu 'thungs bsams nas lus phyed lnga ma mkhar las 'phyang ba ni //
translated: thou wilt hang half thy body over the precipice.

original: lha yi glang po bzhin te chu dre'i zhing ni dri med dkar ba'i shel bzhin snang ba nyid //🔽chu bo de la khyod kyi glag ma bsam pas 'phral la yang dag 'byung 'gyur mdzes pa ni //
analyzed: lha yi glang po bzhin te chu dre'i zhing ni dri med dkar ba'i shel bzhin snang ba nyid // chu bo de la khyod kyi glag ma bsam pas 'phral la yang dag 'byung 'gyur mdzes pa ni //
translated: like the celestial elephant, the field of the river is as bright as a crystal.

original: ya mu na yi chu dang gangg'a 'grogs ba'i mdzes pa las 'ongs gyur la gnas ma yin //
analyzed: ya mu na yi chu dang gangg'a 'grogs ba'i mdzes pa las 'ongs gyur la gnas ma yin //
translated: The beauty of the river, which is produced by the thought of your coming, is not to be found in the beauty of the Yamunā and the Ganges united.

original: rdo leb steng du ri dags gnas pas ri dags lte ba'i dri bzang 'dzin pa'i rdo ldan zhing //
analyzed: rdo leb steng du ri dags gnas pas ri dags lte ba'i dri bzang 'dzin pa'i rdo ldan zhing //
translated: The stone slab is the abode of the deer, and the deer is the abode of the sweet scent of the navel.

original: gangg'a nyid kyi yab gyur kha bar dkar ba'i g-yo med gangs ldan de nyid thob byas nas //
analyzed: gangg'a nyid kyi yab gyur kha bar dkar ba'i g-yo med gangs ldan de nyid thob byas nas //
translated: Having reached that very mountain, the abode of snow, the father of the Ganges, white with snow,

original: lam gyis ngal ba rnam par 'dul ba'i ched du de yi rtse la slebs nas 'dug pa yi //
analyzed: lam gyis ngal ba rnam par 'dul ba'i ched du de yi rtse la slebs nas 'dug pa yi //
translated: you should rest on its peak in order to overcome the fatigue of the journey.

original: mdzes pa mig gsum pa yi bzhon ba dkar ba'i khyu mchog rva yis 'dam ni glangs ba bzhin //
analyzed: mdzes pa mig gsum pa yi bzhon ba dkar ba'i khyu mchog rva yis 'dam ni glangs ba bzhin //
translated: It is as if the white bull, the vehicle of the three-eyed one, had plowed the mud with his horns.

original: de la gal te rlung gis rab bskyod thang shing lag pa kun du 'thabs pa las byung ba'i //
analyzed: de la gal te rlung gis rab bskyod thang shing lag pa kun du 'thabs pa las byung ba'i //
translated: If the wind should stir the branches of the sāla trees there, and a sound arise from their mutual clashing,

original: me yi dug dang me stag dag gis 'brong gi dga' ma'i spu tshogs mang po sreg byed na //
analyzed: me yi dug dang me stag dag gis 'brong gi dga' ma'i spu tshogs mang po sreg byed na //
translated: The fire and the sparks consume the thick hair of the wild yak’s tail.

original: khyod kyis de rnams zhi ba'i ched du chu 'dzin stong phrag mang po char ni bya bar 'os //
analyzed: khyod kyis de rnams zhi ba'i ched du chu 'dzin stong phrag mang po char ni bya bar 'os //
translated: It is fitting that you, for their sake, should send down a thousand streams of rain.

original: gang phyir chen po rnams kyi phun tshogs 'bras bu mang po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa nyid //
analyzed: gang phyir chen po rnams kyi phun tshogs 'bras bu mang po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa nyid //
translated: For the great, indeed, are those who soothe the pain of many with the fruit of their perfection.

original: der ni khyod kyis sgra chen bsgrags la ma bzod che ba'i dregs pa kun du ldan pa'i rkang brgyad pa //
analyzed: der ni khyod kyis sgra chen bsgrags la ma bzod che ba'i dregs pa kun du ldan pa'i rkang brgyad pa //
translated: There, the eight-footed one, filled with the pride of great insolence, cried out in a loud voice,

original: khyod kyi steng du mchod bar bya'o snyam nas ma mchongs rang gi yan lag kun du rmas //

translated: And from the power of the protection, the flowers grow and hang down, within reach of the hand.

original: bkong ma bzang mo'i chu ni mar ka ta'i rdo yi phring ba bsgrigs pa'i lam skas can //
analyzed: bkong ma bzang mo'i chu ni mar ka ta'i rdo yi phring ba bsgrigs pa'i lam skas can //
translated: The water of the excellent lake is like the path of a staircase of crystal.

original: 'di nas mdzes pa'i gser gyi padma rgyas pa rin chen rtsa ldan rnams kyis khyab pa ste //
analyzed: 'di nas mdzes pa'i gser gyi padma rgyas pa rin chen rtsa ldan rnams kyis khyab pa ste //
translated: Here the beautiful lake is covered with full-blown golden lotuses with jeweled stalks.

original: gdung ba dang bral ngang ba'i tshogs rnams dag ni gangg'a'i chu la gnas par byas pa'i tshe //
analyzed: gdung ba dang bral ngang ba'i tshogs rnams dag ni gangg'a'i chu la gnas par byas pa'i tshe //
translated: When the flocks of geese, free from heat, are resting on the water of the Ganges,

original: khyod nyid yang dag mthong bar gyur kyang nye bar gnas pa'i yid 'ong mtsho las 'gro mi 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod nyid yang dag mthong bar gyur kyang nye bar gnas pa'i yid 'ong mtsho las 'gro mi 'gyur //
translated: you will see them, but you will not leave the beautiful lake where they are.

original: kva ye grogs bzang khyod ni glog gi dag 'am g-yo bzhin nye bar mthong bar gyur pa na //
analyzed: kva ye grogs bzang khyod ni glog gi dag 'am g-yo bzhin nye bar mthong bar gyur pa na //
translated: “‘Ah, my good friend, you are seen to be as fickle as lightning.

original: mtsho de'i dogs na mdzes pa'i ri bo yid 'ong mchog gi aindra n'i la rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: mtsho de'i dogs na mdzes pa'i ri bo yid 'ong mchog gi aindra n'i la rnams kyis ni //
translated: On the shore of that lake are beautiful and excellent mountains of sapphire.

original: rtse mo mdzes par byas par gsar gyi bskor ba rnams kyis bskor ba khyod kyis blta bya ba /🔽bdag gi dga' ma dga' byed @348a * //
analyzed: rtse mo mdzes par byas par gsar gyi bskor ba rnams kyis bskor ba khyod kyis blta bya ba / bdag gi dga' ma dga' byed @348a * //
translated: You will see the city of Pundravardhana, which is surrounded by a wall of new palaces, and is adorned with a crest of beautiful towers.

original: dang bcas de nyid sems gdungs bdag ni shin tu dran par gyur //🔽de la ku ru ba ka'i shing gis bskor ba'i yal ga'i khang bzangs dang ldan nye ba na //
analyzed: dang bcas de nyid sems gdungs bdag ni shin tu dran par gyur // de la ku ru ba ka'i shing gis bskor ba'i yal ga'i khang bzangs dang ldan nye ba na //
translated: My beloved, who delights in me, is there, and my heart is burning with love for her.🔽Near it is a palace of branches, surrounded by kuruvaka trees,

original: mya ngan med shing dmar dang ke sa ra yi shing chen yal 'dab g-yo ba mdzes pa yod //
analyzed: mya ngan med shing dmar dang ke sa ra yi shing chen yal 'dab g-yo ba mdzes pa yod //
translated: where a beautiful aśoka tree and a great flowering kesara tree stand, their branches swaying.

original: gcig la khyod kyi grogs su gyur ba'i dga' ma bdag dang bcas pa'i g-yon pas bsgrun 'dod cing //
analyzed: gcig la khyod kyi grogs su gyur ba'i dga' ma bdag dang bcas pa'i g-yon pas bsgrun 'dod cing //
translated: On one of them your beloved, who is my friend, will stretch out her left hand to me,

original: gzhan la gdong gi chang 'thungs me tog 'byung ba'i don du dga' ma de ni bdag 'dod gyur //
analyzed: gzhan la gdong gi chang 'thungs me tog 'byung ba'i don du dga' ma de ni bdag 'dod gyur //
translated: and on the other I will drink wine from the mouth of that beloved, in order to make the flowers bloom.

original: de yi dbus na rab dkar shel gyi gzhal gser gyi sdong po che zhing mtho bar gnas //
analyzed: de yi dbus na rab dkar shel gyi gzhal gser gyi sdong po che zhing mtho bar gnas //
translated: In the middle of it is a great golden tree, standing tall and white as crystal,

original: rtsa ba rin chen phreng bas bcings pa rdo rje pha lam che ba min pa 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: rtsa ba rin chen phreng bas bcings pa rdo rje pha lam che ba min pa 'od 'phro ba //
translated: The root is bound with a precious garland, and it is not a great diamond, but it radiates light.

original: gang la khyod kyi grogs bzang mgrin sngon gnas nas nyin phyed song tshe rol sgeg gar byed cing //
analyzed: gang la khyod kyi grogs bzang mgrin sngon gnas nas nyin phyed song tshe rol sgeg gar byed cing //
translated: On it is a beautiful friend of yours, a peacock, who dances with a graceful gait when the day has passed at noon.

original: bdag gi mdzes ma rin chen gdu bu 'thab pa'i dbyangs snyan skal bzang mchog tu mdzes pa yod //
analyzed: bdag gi mdzes ma rin chen gdu bu 'thab pa'i dbyangs snyan skal bzang mchog tu mdzes pa yod //
translated: It has a beautiful sound, lovely to the fortunate, from the clashing of my beautiful jewel bracelets.

original: de rnams kyis ni legs par mtshan pa kva ye legs pa'i thugs 'dzin khyod kyis blta bar bya //
analyzed: de rnams kyis ni legs par mtshan pa kva ye legs pa'i thugs 'dzin khyod kyis blta bar bya //
translated: You should look at it, O you who have a good mind and are well marked with them.

original: sgo yi mtha' dang nye ba dag na dung dang padma'i gzugs bris mthong bar byas pa na //
analyzed: sgo yi mtha' dang nye ba dag na dung dang padma'i gzugs bris mthong bar byas pa na //
translated: At the edge of the door, near it, are drawn the forms of a conch and a lotus.

original: da lta bdag dang bral bar gyur pas nges par mdzes pa dman pa nyid du gnas par nges //
analyzed: da lta bdag dang bral bar gyur pas nges par mdzes pa dman pa nyid du gnas par nges //
translated: Now that I am separated from you, it is certain that beauty is diminished.

original: nyi ma nub bar gyur pas nges par padma dag gis mdzes pa nyams par gyur pa nyid //
analyzed: nyi ma nub bar gyur pas nges par padma dag gis mdzes pa nyams par gyur pa nyid //
translated: When the sun has set, the beauty of the lotuses is certainly diminished.

original: mdzes ma de ni yongs su bskyangs ched myur du gshegs nas glang phrug lus bzhin chung ba yis //
analyzed: mdzes ma de ni yongs su bskyangs ched myur du gshegs nas glang phrug lus bzhin chung ba yis //
translated: And, in order to protect her, you must quickly come to her, for she is as slender as a young elephant.

original: mdzes pa'i ri bo de yi ngos la gnas nas dang por legs bshad snyan pa'i gsung gleng mdzod //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i ri bo de yi ngos la gnas nas dang por legs bshad snyan pa'i gsung gleng mdzod //
translated: You must first speak to her in sweet and pleasant words, as you stand on the slope of that beautiful mountain.

original: bdag gi khang nang 'jug tshe me khyer phreng ba lta bu'i snang ba chung shing chud pa ni //
analyzed: bdag gi khang nang 'jug tshe me khyer phreng ba lta bu'i snang ba chung shing chud pa ni //
translated: When she enters my house, the light of the lamps will be dimmed, as if it were a garland of fireflies.

original: mdzes shing rol pa'i smin ma g-yo ba'i glog gi mig ni byas nas khyod kyis blta bar 'os //
analyzed: mdzes shing rol pa'i smin ma g-yo ba'i glog gi mig ni byas nas khyod kyis blta bar 'os //
translated: You must look at her with eyes that are like lightning, with beautiful, playful brows.

original: de na bdag gi dga' ma lus phra mdog mdzes gnyis skyes bkra ba'i phral ma mchu dag ni //🔽bil ma smin pa bskyed pa phra zhing 'dren byed g-yo ba'i ri dags mig can lte ba dma' //
analyzed: de na bdag gi dga' ma lus phra mdog mdzes gnyis skyes bkra ba'i phral ma mchu dag ni // bil ma smin pa bskyed pa phra zhing 'dren byed g-yo ba'i ri dags mig can lte ba dma' //
translated: My beloved has a slender body, a beautiful complexion, and lips that are red like a young shoot.🔽She has the eyes of a deer, a deep navel, and breasts that are firm and pointed like ripe bilva fruit.

original: ro smad sbom zhing dal gyis 'gro mkhas 'o ma 'dzin pa dag gi bar dag mchog tu mdzes //
analyzed: ro smad sbom zhing dal gyis 'gro mkhas 'o ma 'dzin pa dag gi bar dag mchog tu mdzes //
translated: She has a large, round, and shapely posterior, and she walks slowly and gracefully.

original: na chung dag gi yul la mngon du zhen par byed po tshangs pas dang po nyid du gyur //
analyzed: na chung dag gi yul la mngon du zhen par byed po tshangs pas dang po nyid du gyur //
translated: The Creator himself first made the object of the young man’s desire.

original: gzhon ma de ni bdag gi srog ni gnyis par shes par mdzod ces dal gyis smra bar bya //
analyzed: gzhon ma de ni bdag gi srog ni gnyis par shes par mdzod ces dal gyis smra bar bya //
translated: “Know that my life is the second,” she slowly said.

original: bdag dang lhan cig spyod la shin tu ring bar gyur te dang mo gcig pur gyur pa bzhin //
analyzed: bdag dang lhan cig spyod la shin tu ring bar gyur te dang mo gcig pur gyur pa bzhin //
translated: “I am far away from my companions, and am alone like a doe.

original: 'di la nyin zhag mang po 'ong ba rnams su yid la gcags pa med pa nyid du gyur //
analyzed: 'di la nyin zhag mang po 'ong ba rnams su yid la gcags pa med pa nyid du gyur //
translated: I have spent many days here without any sorrow.”

original: dgun smad padma can @348b ni kha bas nyams pa bzhin du gzugs gzhan thob par bdag gis shes //
analyzed: dgun smad padma can @348b ni kha bas nyams pa bzhin du gzugs gzhan thob par bdag gis shes //
translated: “I know that her form has changed, like a lotus in the cold of winter.”

original: dga' ma de ni nges par mchi ma mang po babs las mig 'phur che ba dag tu gyur //
analyzed: dga' ma de ni nges par mchi ma mang po babs las mig 'phur che ba dag tu gyur //
translated: “Her eyes are swollen from the many tears she has shed.”

original: steng 'og chu yi pags pa dag ni shugs ring shin tu dro ba'i dbugs ni du ma byas //
analyzed: steng 'og chu yi pags pa dag ni shugs ring shin tu dro ba'i dbugs ni du ma byas //
translated: “The skin of her upper and lower lips is dry from the many hot sighs she has breathed.”

original: gdong ni legs par bkod la len bu 'phyang bas bsgribs pas mtha' dag gsal ba min pa ni //
analyzed: gdong ni legs par bkod la len bu 'phyang bas bsgribs pas mtha' dag gsal ba min pa ni //
translated: “Her face is not clear, for her hanging curls hide it.”

original: zla ba'i 'od kyis mdzes pa khyod ni 'ongs pas bsgribs las snang min sman pa 'dzin pa bzhin //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od kyis mdzes pa khyod ni 'ongs pas bsgribs las snang min sman pa 'dzin pa bzhin //
translated: The moon, obscured by your beauty, shines not, as if in anger.

original: gtor ma byed pa'ang bral bas btud par gyur pa bdag 'dra yid kyis rtogs bya 'dri ba'am //
analyzed: gtor ma byed pa'ang bral bas btud par gyur pa bdag 'dra yid kyis rtogs bya 'dri ba'am //
translated: The sacrificial fire, neglected, has gone out, as if in sorrow.

original: snyan pa'i tshigs gis smra ba'i sha ri ka ni gur gyi nang na gnas shing gnas pa la //
analyzed: snyan pa'i tshigs gis smra ba'i sha ri ka ni gur gyi nang na gnas shing gnas pa la //
translated: The lute, in its case, is silent, as if in grief.

original: kva ye grogs mo de yi dga' ba dran nam zhes pa'i dri ba byed pa bdag kyang ni //
analyzed: kva ye grogs mo de yi dga' ba dran nam zhes pa'i dri ba byed pa bdag kyang ni //
translated: Friend, do you remember the joy of his embrace?

original: khyod ni mthong bar gyur pa na ni nga ni mdun du 'ongs shing dga' bar byed par 'gyur //🔽kva ye grogs bzang dri ma'i gos dang bcas pa'i rang gi phang par pi wang bzhag byas nas //
analyzed: khyod ni mthong bar gyur pa na ni nga ni mdun du 'ongs shing dga' bar byed par 'gyur // kva ye grogs bzang dri ma'i gos dang bcas pa'i rang gi phang par pi wang bzhag byas nas //
translated: When I see you, I come to you, and you welcome me.🔽Friend, take your lute, and with your sweet voice

original: bdag gi ming nas bod pas mtshan cing 'dod pa'i dbyangs snyan cher sgrogs snyan par gyur pa'i tshe //
analyzed: bdag gi ming nas bod pas mtshan cing 'dod pa'i dbyangs snyan cher sgrogs snyan par gyur pa'i tshe //
translated: sing the songs that he loved to hear.

original: rang gis byas par gyur kyang dbyangs snyan dum bu dum bur bcas nas sems zhing yang yang ni //
analyzed: rang gis byas par gyur kyang dbyangs snyan dum bu dum bur bcas nas sems zhing yang yang ni //
translated: And though he has done it himself, he will break the tune into fragments, and will hum it over and over again.

original: mig chus brlan pa'i rgyud mangs cung zad phyi bar byas nas kyang ni de ni 'ong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mig chus brlan pa'i rgyud mangs cung zad phyi bar byas nas kyang ni de ni 'ong bar 'gyur //
translated: And after he has wiped his eyes a little with the water that fills them, he will come.

original: bdag ni 'ongs pa'i nyin nas brtsams te nyin zhag dang ni zla ba song ba'i lhag ma rnams //
analyzed: bdag ni 'ongs pa'i nyin nas brtsams te nyin zhag dang ni zla ba song ba'i lhag ma rnams //
translated: From the day of my coming, the remaining days, months, and years

original: sa la rnam par 'god cing sgo yi nang du gangs kyi me tog rnams ni sgyur bar byed //
analyzed: sa la rnam par 'god cing sgo yi nang du gangs kyi me tog rnams ni sgyur bar byed //
translated: I will count out on the ground, and I will change the snow-flowers at the door.

original: bdag can nam ni phrad par 'gyur ram snyam pa snyid la sems pa'i rtsom pa mang po byed //
analyzed: bdag can nam ni phrad par 'gyur ram snyam pa snyid la sems pa'i rtsom pa mang po byed //
translated: I will make many preparations in my heart, thinking, “Will I meet him or not?”

original: phal cher bud med rnams ni bdag po bral bas yid kyi las kyi gdung ba mang po nyid //
analyzed: phal cher bud med rnams ni bdag po bral bas yid kyi las kyi gdung ba mang po nyid //
translated: For the most part, women, being separated from their lords, have many mental sufferings from their work.

original: nyin mo'i bar la bya ba dang ldan bdag dang bral las de ltar shin tu min na yang //
analyzed: nyin mo'i bar la bya ba dang ldan bdag dang bral las de ltar shin tu min na yang //
translated: Though I am not so much so, being occupied during the day,

original: mtshan mo shin tu ring las khyod kyi grogs mo bya med gdung ba che bar bdag gis shes //
analyzed: mtshan mo shin tu ring las khyod kyi grogs mo bya med gdung ba che bar bdag gis shes //
translated: I know that your friend, the night, is long and full of grief for you, who are without a companion.

original: legs ma mtshan ring rnams la gnyid bral stan med sa la nyal tshe dra mi gnye bar ni //
analyzed: legs ma mtshan ring rnams la gnyid bral stan med sa la nyal tshe dra mi gnye bar ni //
translated: O fair one, in the long nights, when you are sleepless and lying on the bare ground without a pillow,

original: gnas nas blta bya bdag gi phrin rnams bzlas pa rnams ni bde ba'i ched du nus pa nyid //
analyzed: gnas nas blta bya bdag gi phrin rnams bzlas pa rnams ni bde ba'i ched du nus pa nyid //
translated: the messengers, my letters, are able to bring you comfort, if you will but look at them.

original: bral bas lhag par gdungs pas sa yi gzhil gzhogs gcig brten te nyal bar gyur pa ni //
analyzed: bral bas lhag par gdungs pas sa yi gzhil gzhogs gcig brten te nyal bar gyur pa ni //
translated: But when you lie on one side of the ground, burning with excessive grief at being separated from me,

original: chos gcig zla ba shar ba cha gcig lhag ma rtsa bar gnas pa'i lus bzhin du ni gyur //
analyzed: chos gcig zla ba shar ba cha gcig lhag ma rtsa bar gnas pa'i lus bzhin du ni gyur //
translated: one half of your body is as if left behind, like the moon when it is half-set.

original: bdag dang lhan cig gnas tshe 'dod pa'i dga' ma rnams kyi mtshan mo skad cig bzhin du song //
analyzed: bdag dang lhan cig gnas tshe 'dod pa'i dga' ma rnams kyi mtshan mo skad cig bzhin du song //
translated: When you were with me, the nights of love passed like a moment;

original: gang de da ltar bral ba las skyes mchi ma dron mo rnams bcas @349a * //
analyzed: gang de da ltar bral ba las skyes mchi ma dron mo rnams bcas @349a * //
translated: now, because of separation, they are long, and with hot tears

original: shin tu ring ba nyid //
analyzed: shin tu ring ba nyid //
translated: they are full of grief.

original: khrus kyis dag cing yangs shing rtsub pa'i skra yi len bu 'gram pa dag las 'phyang ba rnams //
analyzed: khrus kyis dag cing yangs shing rtsub pa'i skra yi len bu 'gram pa dag las 'phyang ba rnams //
translated: Her hair, smooth and soft as it falls upon her cheeks, is washed and cleansed.

original: dbugs kyi rlung gis sel bar byed pa rnams la mchu yi 'dab ma dag ni dal bar des //
analyzed: dbugs kyi rlung gis sel bar byed pa rnams la mchu yi 'dab ma dag ni dal bar des //
translated: Her lips are slowly opened by the breath that stirs them.

original: gnyid ni 'dod ba med cing bdag dang phrad ba las byung gnyid ni cung zad 'byung 'gyur zhes//
analyzed: gnyid ni 'dod ba med cing bdag dang phrad ba las byung gnyid ni cung zad 'byung 'gyur zhes//
translated: She is without desire, and yet a little sleep, born of her union with me, comes over her.

original: dga' ma de ni 'dren byed mchi ma dang bcas shin tu gdungs pa mthong bas 'gog par byed //
analyzed: dga' ma de ni 'dren byed mchi ma dang bcas shin tu gdungs pa mthong bas 'gog par byed //
translated: I see her, my beloved, with eyes full of tears, and I hold her back.

original: bdag gis bcings pa'i spyi gtsug len bu bral ba'i nyi ma dang po nyid la dor byas nas //🔽len bu rnams ni gcig gyur reg pa rtsub pa mi bzad 'gram pa dag la gnas pa las //
analyzed: bdag gis bcings pa'i spyi gtsug len bu bral ba'i nyi ma dang po nyid la dor byas nas // len bu rnams ni gcig gyur reg pa rtsub pa mi bzad 'gram pa dag la gnas pa las //
translated: On the first day of my absence, I had cut off the braid of hair that was fastened on her head.🔽Now her hair, all in one place, rough and hard, lies on her cheek.

original: sen mo ring ba'i lag pas reg pa'i nyon mongs ldan pas lan cig min par sgyur byed ma //
analyzed: sen mo ring ba'i lag pas reg pa'i nyon mongs ldan pas lan cig min par sgyur byed ma //
translated: She is tossed about by the long nails of her fingers, and she turns over and over again.

original: rje bo khros pa'i bka' lung rdzogs pa gdung bral gyur pa bdag gis gang bde dgrol bar bya //
analyzed: rje bo khros pa'i bka' lung rdzogs pa gdung bral gyur pa bdag gis gang bde dgrol bar bya //
translated: I will do what I can to free myself from the curse of my angry master.

original: mig ni mchi ma mang po rnams kyis gdungs la rdzi ma rnams kyis bkab par byas nas ni //
analyzed: mig ni mchi ma mang po rnams kyis gdungs la rdzi ma rnams kyis bkab par byas nas ni //
translated: My eyes are swollen shut with weeping, and my eyelashes are covered with tears.

original: zla ba'i rkang ba'i 'od zer bdud rtsi sil ma rnams ni dra mig nang nas zhugs pa na//
analyzed: zla ba'i rkang ba'i 'od zer bdud rtsi sil ma rnams ni dra mig nang nas zhugs pa na//
translated: The moon’s rays, like a shower of nectar, enter through the lattice-windows,

original: bkab pa bsal te mngon du 'ongs nas dang por dga' 'gyur ldog pa na ni de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: bkab pa bsal te mngon du 'ongs nas dang por dga' 'gyur ldog pa na ni de bzhin nyid //
translated: and, dispelling the darkness, first delight her, and then depart.

original: sprin dang bcas pa'i nyin mo sa la gnas pa'i padma rgyas min zum pa ma yin bzhin //
analyzed: sprin dang bcas pa'i nyin mo sa la gnas pa'i padma rgyas min zum pa ma yin bzhin //
translated: Like a lotus on land, which is neither open nor closed on a cloudy day,

original: dga' ma de ni nyin par mdza' bo'i grogs mo rnams kyis skad cig kyang ni gtong min bzhin //
analyzed: dga' ma de ni nyin par mdza' bo'i grogs mo rnams kyis skad cig kyang ni gtong min bzhin //
translated: she is neither delighted nor sad, for her lover’s friends keep her company all day long.

original: lus phra ma la gcig ni blta tshe kun gyi rmad byung blta bas 'jug par 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: lus phra ma la gcig ni blta tshe kun gyi rmad byung blta bas 'jug par 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: When she is alone, she looks at his slender body, and is absorbed in the wonder of it.

original: mtshan mo skye bo rnams ni nyal bar gyur la mdzes ma gnyid bral kva ye chu 'dzin khyod //
analyzed: mtshan mo skye bo rnams ni nyal bar gyur la mdzes ma gnyid bral kva ye chu 'dzin khyod //
translated: At night, when people are asleep, O cloud, comfort my beloved, who is sleepless without you.

original: dra mig dang ni nye bar gnas nas nyal sar nye bar 'ongs te de ni dga' bar mdzod //
analyzed: dra mig dang ni nye bar gnas nas nyal sar nye bar 'ongs te de ni dga' bar mdzod //
translated: And, lying close to the lattice, she will come to your couch, and you must delight her.

original: len bu gcig tu gyur la reg pa 'gram pa la gnas sen mo mtho ba'i lag pa yis //
analyzed: len bu gcig tu gyur la reg pa 'gram pa la gnas sen mo mtho ba'i lag pa yis //
translated: With her hand, the nails of which are high, she will touch her cheek, which is all bristling with the hair of delight,

original: yang dang yang du sel bar byed cing sa yi gzhi yi mal gyi steng du gzhogs gcig ni //
analyzed: yang dang yang du sel bar byed cing sa yi gzhi yi mal gyi steng du gzhogs gcig ni //
translated: and, turning over and over on the bed of the ground, she will fall on one side,

original: ltung bar gyur cing de yi mtha' na mchi ma rnams ni 'bab pa do shal chad pa dag / g-yo zhing ltung bar gyur pa bzhin du gnas pa de mthong nyid kyis dal gyis brjod par bya //
analyzed: ltung bar gyur cing de yi mtha' na mchi ma rnams ni 'bab pa do shal chad pa dag / g-yo zhing ltung bar gyur pa bzhin du gnas pa de mthong nyid kyis dal gyis brjod par bya //
translated: and, as if in anger, will let her necklace slip off and remain with her tears flowing.

original: mdzes ma de ni rgyan rnams yang dag gzhag cing lus ni shin tu phral 'dzin byed cing //
analyzed: mdzes ma de ni rgyan rnams yang dag gzhag cing lus ni shin tu phral 'dzin byed cing //
translated: When she has put on her ornaments, and, with her body all trembling,

original: gdung ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mal stan steng na yang dang yang du 'dre ldog byed pa na //
analyzed: gdung ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mal stan steng na yang dang yang du 'dre ldog byed pa na //
translated: is turning over and over on the bed, racked with the pain of love,

original: khyod kyang 'phral la chu yi rang bzhin mchi ma 'dzag pa nyid du 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
analyzed: khyod kyang 'phral la chu yi rang bzhin mchi ma 'dzag pa nyid du 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
translated: then, my friend, you must speak gently to her, lest she suddenly burst into tears.
